entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries early this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
